ygData.subject: Re: Is it possible to create jobs without using WUI?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Sudhindra, this is possible for sure. You basically have two options. Either you can use cmdline-jmxclient (as included in heritrix) or write your own java

Hi Sudhindra,

this is possible for sure. 

You basically have two options.=
 Either you can use cmdline-jmxclient
(as included in heritrix) or write yo=
ur own java application that will
communicate with heritrix via jmx. You'll=
 need the WUI just once -
that will be to create an initial order.xml (basi=
cally thats
heritrix's spider configuration) that suits your needs.

Olaf F=
reyer
